text: Santa Monica is a beach town in California. It is next to Los Angeles, California, US. It was made a city in 1886. In 2020, there were 93,076 people living there. It is famous for the Santa Monica Pier that has many fun rides. ==Famous people from Santa Monica== *Sandy Nelson (d. 2022) ==References== ==Other websites== * * Santa Monica Convention and Visitors Bureau * Santa Monica Chamber of Commerce * Santa Monica Little League * Santa Monica Public Library * * * A Weekend in Santa Monica â€“ slideshow by The New York Times *
title: Santa Monica, California
